channel.title: rvest on Consulting Statistician
channel.description: Recent content in rvest on Consulting Statistician

item.title: Web-scraping ODI Cricket World Cup Matches
item.description: Introduction Web scraping Process a. Extracting matches information and storing it in a separate column after removing “:”. b. Extracting the Location and finding who vs who. c. Extracting the Date match and winning conditions. d. Information of both teams who played the match into separate columns. e. All those separate information after extraction now into one data set. Links for world cups Function for data extraction of World cup matches Summarize Introduction World Cup matches are now in action as all initial matches are over, while semi-final and final matches are to come.
